q: What are the most important web development trends in 2025?
a: Key trends include AI-powered development tools (GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT), modern frameworks (Next.js 15, Remix, Astro, SolidJS), TypeScript for type safety, Tailwind CSS for styling, React Server Components, and edge functions for global deployment.
Yes, absolutely. Type safety is no longer optional. TypeScript prevents bugs, improves developer experience, and makes codebases maintainable. It's considered an essential skill for 2025.

q: What frameworks should I focus on?
a: Next.js 15 (server components, edge runtime), Remix (progressive enhancement), Astro (content sites with island architecture), and SolidJS (reactive primitives without virtual DOM). Each serves different use cases.

Core Web Vitals are ranking factors for SEO: LCP (Largest Contentful Paint < 2.5s), FID (First Input Delay < 100ms), and CLS (Cumulative Layout Shift < 0.1). They measure user experience and affect search rankings.

q: How do I optimize web performance?
a: Use image optimization (next/image), code splitting and lazy loading, service workers for offline support, critical CSS inlining, and font optimization with subsetting.

While not mainstream yet, understanding blockchain basics and smart contracts will set you apart. Learn wallet integration (MetaMask, WalletConnect), smart contract interaction (ethers.js, web3.js), and decentralized storage (IPFS, Arweave).
